title: I am lagging a lot in game and receiving a message that says in the image below however windows 10

replies.body:
The error message you are seeing in the client might be a result of [Clubs Tags being disabled](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#euw).  If you click ok and nothing really happens, then this appears to be the case.

The lag you are experiencing in-game seems to be completely un-related though.  If this is consistently happening game to game, then make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  It has the most common solutions to get rid of this lag and get you playing consistently again.

Let me know if you are still experiencing these same issues!

that message is de-sorting my friend list every time it pops up.
edit: only if i have show offline friends enabled
i also have lag issues , starting from today i have like 250 ms , but usually i get like 60 ...
